entries.title: Spatial Computing & Immersion
entries.description: Enrich your XR technology with Immersive Computing by GenAI

about.summary: AI, IoT, Digital twins, and GenAI deliver content off-screen and into the world exactly when and where it is needed. Experience BCG built demos on the Apple Vision Pro, Magic Leap and Meta Quest, as well as the power of Spatial Digital Twins.
benefits: Bringing these technologies to life in your organization
